artist: Artist: Kawase Hasui; Publisher: Kansai Bijutsusha; Producer: Watanabe Shōzaburō; Printer: Ono Gintarō
description: red-pillared pavilion with a wall overlooking calm water; figures seated under pavilion and standing by wall, overlooking water; cherry blossoms, LLC; boats on opposite bank, URC
markings: LRC, red round artist\'s seal: 川セ {Kawase}; LR margin, publisher seal H: 渡辺木版美術画舖工作 {Watanabe mokuhan bijutsu gaho kōsaku} (produced by Watanabe woodblock print art store); LR margin, printer seal: 摺師　斧銀太郎 {surishi Ono Gintarō} (printer Ono Gintarō)
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Eight Views of Korea (Chōsen hakkei 朝鮮八景)
title: Spring at Pyongyang (Pubyok Pavilion from Moran Hill)
